Text:
Anyone having problem creating a DVD from the TS-folder? Make a new folder - name it in capital letters VIDEO_TS and copy all TS content to the new folder. Then burn as a TS folder.

In my version of Toast - it seems the original TS folder is corrupt...

Thanks to the uploader.

Quality was good - A9 V9, thnx to the uploader! Movie was OK as i expected it to be! Storyline is intelligent and entertaining and acters were OK! I usually watch all the movies at film.kbc44.com because they have HD's but they didn't have this one so im happy to have piratebay :) Thank you once again uploader for this great share!
